name: TSTR - Twenty Seconds To Reflect
description:
Controls: 
WASD - movement, LMC - reflect, RMC - teleport, R (after gameover) - restart.

Small 'backlore':
In the distant future of machine intelligence surpassing Mankind, full of perfect shapes (circles and squares) and colors (black, gray and red), someone decided to rebel and show the Supreme Mainframe that there are other equally optimal shapes and colors.

This Hoodlum  AI now has 20 seconds to reflect all  Supreme Mainframe bot attacks.

For 20 sec game jam, optional (very optional) theme: Hoodlum 

Engine, art, sounds, music: kaboom.js, my own "programmer art", jsfxr, imsobadatnicknames.itch.io

Thanks:
РПГ.УКР for moral support.
